data.title: Clifford Bunkley Obituary in Grantville at Sewell Mortuary
data.meta_description: K. K. Sewell Funeral Home in Manchester respectfully announces the passing of Clifford Bunkley on January 6th, 2021.  Graveside service will be Tuesday the 12th, at 12:00 PM at Powell Baptist Church.  Visitation is from 12 to 4 PM on the 11th, at KK Sewell Funeral Home  Brother Clifford Bunkley was born October 15. 1953 to the late Douglas and Mary Bunkley in Talbot County, Georgia.  He accepted Christ at an early age and joined Powell Baptist Church. He was one of eleven children.  He leaves to cherish his memories two brothers and two sisters, Matthew Bunkley of East Point, GA, Ruth Carter of Talbotton, GA, Mary Hollis of Hartford, CT and Walter (Dorothy) Bunkley of East Point, GA; and a host of nieces, nephews, cousins and friends who loved him dearly.
data.text:
K. K. Sewell Funeral Home in Manchester respectfully announces the passing of Clifford Bunkley on January 6th, 2021.

Graveside service will be Tuesday the 12th, at 12:00 PM at Powell Baptist Church.

Visitation is from 12 to 4 PM on the 11th, at KK Sewell Funeral Home

Brother Clifford Bunkley was born October 15. 1953 to the late Douglas and Mary Bunkley in Talbot County, Georgia.

He accepted Christ at an early age and joined Powell Baptist Church. He was one of eleven children.

He leaves to cherish his memories two brothers and two sisters, Matthew Bunkley of East Point, GA, Ruth Carter of Talbotton, GA, Mary Hollis of Hartford, CT and Walter (Dorothy) Bunkley of East Point, GA; and a host of nieces, nephews, cousins and friends who loved him dearly.
